description: Returns, adds, edits, and removes third-party service integration configurations. MongoDB Cloud sends alerts to each third-party service that you configure.

ProjectId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your project.

Type.description: Human-readable label that identifies the service to which you want to integrate with MongoDB Cloud. The value must match the third-party service integration type.

LicenseKey.description: Unique 40-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your New Relic license.

AccountId.description: Unique 40-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your New Relic account.

WriteToken.description: Insert key associated with your New Relic account.

ReadToken.description: Query key used to access your New Relic account.

ApiKey.description: Key that allows MongoDB Cloud to access your Opsgenie/Datadog account.

Region.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your project.

ServiceKey.description: Service key associated with your PagerDuty account.

ApiToken.description: Key that allows MongoDB Cloud to access your Slack/FlowDock account.

TeamName.description:
string
Human-readable label that identifies your Slack team. Set this parameter when you configure a legacy Slack integration.

ChannelName.description: Name of the Slack channel to which MongoDB Cloud sends alert notifications.

RoutingKey.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your project.

FlowName.description: Human-readable label that identifies your Flowdock Flow.

OrgName.description: Human-readable label that identifies your Flowdock organization.

Url.description: Endpoint web address to which MongoDB Cloud sends notifications.

Secret.description: Parameter returned if someone configure this webhook with a secret.

MicrosoftTeamsWebhookUrl.description: Endpoint web address of the Microsoft Teams webhook to which MongoDB Cloud sends notifications.

UserName.description: Human-readable label that identifies your Prometheus incoming webhook.

Password.description: Password required for your integration with Prometheus

ServiceDiscovery.description: Desired method to discover the Prometheus service.

Scheme.description: Security Scheme to apply to HyperText Transfer Protocol (HTTP) traffic between Prometheus and MongoDB Cloud.

Enabled.description: Flag that indicates whether someone has activated the Prometheus integration.

ListenAddress.description: Combination of IPv4 address and Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) port or the IANA port alone to which Prometheus binds to ingest MongoDB metrics.

TlsPemPath.description: Root-relative path to the Transport Layer Security (TLS) Privacy Enhanced Mail (PEM) key and certificate file on the host.
